discourse_list.title: \xf0\x9f\x9a\x80 Core Unit Launch Pod Sessions ||| Session #5: Content Production Core Unit, MKT-001

content.content: Core Unit Launch Pod Sessions ||| Session #5: Content Production Core Unit, MKT-001 For the 5th session of Core Unit Launch Pod we’ll have Seth Goldfarb (@seth) introducing the Content Production Core Unit (MKT-001) and talking about its acompanying proposals for budget and Facilitator onboarding. Here’s the Mandate for this Core Unit:  The Content Production core unit will be responsible for creating, and supporting the creation of written, audio, and visual content that educates audiences on MakerDAO, promotes the work and culture of the ecosystem, and encourages people to use Dai and the Maker Protocol.  @AmyJung will be doing the hosting! Join us!   When Time in your local-timezone format: 2021-03-24T17:00:00Z  Where When the time is ripe, follow this Zoom link  Or use this information:  Meeting ID: 829 4277 3725 Passcode: COREUNIT One tap mobile +13017158592,82942773725#,*46651499# US (Washington DC) +13126266799,82942773725#,*46651499# US (Chicago) Dial by your location +1 301 715 8592 US (Washington DC) +1 312 626 6799 US (Chicago) +1 346 248 7799 US (Houston) +1 646 558 8656 US (New York) +1 669 900 9128 US (San Jose) +1 253 215 8782 US (Tacoma) Meeting ID: 829 4277 3725 Passcode: 46651499 Find your local number: Zoom International Dial-in Numbers - Zoom  attn: @JerryAG, @AmyJung, @aburban90, @davidutro, @psychonaut, @Nadia, @LongForWisdom, @juan, @elihu, @Prose11, @flipflopflapdelegate , @g_dip , @mrabino1, @tadeo, @iammeeoh , @MarianoDP, @planet_x
